products.name: Russell Hobbs Electronic Microwave Silver
products.description: This impressive Russell Hobbs 36L capacity electronic and grill microwave is a must-have for easy cooking! With 8 auto menus, grill and combination cooking and 5 power levels.

products.name: Russell Hobbs 20L Flatbed Microwave Oven
products.description: Flatbed technology removes the need for a turntable, maximising the 20L internal space so that square plates and casserole dishes can be reheated or defrosted.

products.name: Russell Hobbs 20lt Manual Microwave
products.description: The elegant Russell Hobbs Classic 20L Manual Microwave with Mirror Finish is the ideal cooking companion in the kitchen. Designed for ease of use, it features a manual control panel with a rotary timer.

products.name: Samsung 28L Solo Electronic Microwave
products.description: Serve perfectly cooked fresh vegetables, pasta and more with ease in the ME6104ST1 Solo microwave.

products.name: Samsung 32lt Solo Microwave Silver
products.description: A variety of fresh and healthy meals are at your fingertips with 9 pre-set cook modes on Samsung's Mirror Grill.

products.name: Samsung 40L Electronic Microwave Silver
products.description: At Samsung, we pride ourselves on improving every product we make with innovative technologies. Our Triple Distribution System.
